channel.title: SML - SMR Forums
channel.description: Topics in the 'SML' category Satisfactory Mod Loader related discussions.

item.title: How will we know when mods are working again?
item.dc:creator: @Jazzlovr Jazzlovr
item.description:
@Jazzlovr wrote:

I don’t see anything in the Launcher today indicating that my game’s about to crash on launch, but I do understand it’s a matter of waiting for mod updates (for me, it’s Passive Mode, More Milestones, and Kraigsta Milestones). Is it simply “try it every few days and see”, or something more subtle than that?

Posts: 2

Participants: 2

Read full topic
item.source: How will we know when mods are working again?

item.title: SMM Pushing all the wrong buttons
item.dc:creator: @Roger_Dyer Roger Dyer
item.description:
@Roger_Dyer wrote:

So, today I finally got this working after turning of one of my security programs and removing faulty mods, only for it to crash my game.

It would seem that there is some sort of compatibility issue with UE4, as that is what is crashing when I try to launch the game.

And so developers what are you going to about this, as I am getting very, very, very angry with this!!

Posts: 2

Participants: 2

Read full topic
item.source: SMM Pushing all the wrong buttons

item.title: SMM constant error message
item.dc:creator: @Roger_Dyer Roger Dyer
item.description:
@Roger_Dyer wrote:

Hi all, well since the 28/6/2021 and the v2.5.0 update, I have not been able to use the mod manager and every time I try to use it I get the same message.

I have uninstalled it, reinstalled so many times I gave up counting, I have even remove all my mods and game save, all to no effect it still keeps displaying the same message.

Also I am not able to access discord to find help their.

I have finally found the cause of this and it is any incompatibility with with one of my security software programs ( Malwarebytes ).

Posts: 1

Participants: 1

Read full topic
item.source: SMM constant error message

item.title: SML not being loaded (again)
item.dc:creator: @Gennadiy_Poryev Gennadiy Poryev
item.description:
@Gennadiy_Poryev wrote:

I run Steam experimental build CL#165698. No mods works just fine.
I also downloaded latest SMM 2.5.0 and installed some mod (doesn’t matter which one, fails the same).
Judging from the contents of
steamapps\common\Satisfactory\FactoryGame\Mods\SML\ResourcesSML.uplugin
which reads
"VersionName": "3.1.1",
"SemVersion": "3.1.1",
"FriendlyName": "Satisfactory Mod Loader",
"Description": "Mod loading and compatibility API for Satisfactory",
I guess SMM installed SML 3.1.1 which is latest as of the time of this writing.
Upon starting the game I see two sequential error message boxes as shown below:

Also of note is the fact that my friend runs the same versions on his machine just fine, so it must be something wrong with my system.
What do I do to amend the situation?

Posts: 3

Participants: 3

Read full topic
item.source: SML not being loaded (again)

item.title: Error Error while loading profile: Unexpected error while downloading file
item.dc:creator: @LinHaoNan98 Lin Hao Nan
item.description:
@LinHaoNan98 wrote:

MWF4%606YG3%7B_OBHMY8DWS3ON550×850 48.1 KB

当你第一次打开MOD管理器，并且找到想要的MOD点击下载时！出现下载SML出错提示！
别担心！我找到了解决方法！

①首先你应该让他弹出此错误一次！

②win+R打开运行 输入这段神秘代码:%LOCALAPPDATA% 如图所示！

点击确定！

③在打开的文件夹中找到 AppData\Local\SatisfactoryModManager\downloadCache\smlVersions\3.1.1文件夹，看看里面有没有东西，有的话就删除清空！

④然后你可以找你的朋友把他的3.1.1文件夹里的 SML.smod 复制给你，粘贴进去就行了！
或者下载我提供的 SML.smod 但是这个网站好像没有办法上传文件并提供下载！以后再说

⑤然后打开Satisfactory游戏文件夹，找到 Satisfactory\FactoryGame\Mods\SML 查看里面是否有文件 和图片一样的哦！

6%25%7D%40%60%5D2%5B%5D16N%604M0YO7EDI81119×626 30.8 KB

如果没有 请到 https://github.com/satisfactorymodding/SatisfactoryModLoader/releases/tag/3.1.1 下载sml.zip 并且解压到MOD文件夹里！

⑥此时再重新打开MOD管理器 然后设置profile:为 development 恭喜你 大功告成！

你可以下载自己喜欢的MOD了 ！

Posts: 2

Participants: 2

Read full topic
item.source: Error Error while loading profile: Unexpected error while downloading file

item.title: Game crashed when trying to continue a save after adding a mod
item.dc:creator: @Eli_Remington Eli Remington
item.description:
@Eli_Remington wrote:

I have put many hours into a save and wanted to add another mod to that save but it keeps crashing when I try to continue from my last save. The game launched perfectly fine but crashes when I try to continue. I can create a new save perfectly fine and it doesn’t crash. I’ve tried to delete the mod then continue but it still crashes. It only does this when I try to add a mod to an existing game. I really don’t want to start over again. PLS HELP!! I’ll attach a pic of the crash report.

ERROR1914×1040 45.8 KB

Posts: 4

Participants: 3

Read full topic
item.source: Game crashed when trying to continue a save after adding a mod

item.title: Satisfactory not launching correctly. Error
item.dc:creator: @R4tt3xx R4tt3xx
item.description:
@R4tt3xx wrote:

The game returns an error when trying to run with any mod installed.

“Plugin ‘SML’ failed to load because module ‘SML’ could not be found. Please ensure the plugin is properly installed, otherwise consider disabling the plugin for this project”

I have cleared the cache, reinstalled the application, reinstalled Satisfactory and updated to the latest version.

Posts: 7

Participants: 5

Read full topic
item.source: Satisfactory not launching correctly. Error

item.title: Plugin 'SML' failed to load because module 'SML' could not be found
item.dc:creator: @Mine_Downloader Mine
item.description:
@Mine_Downloader wrote:

So I’m testing this new mod, and manually installed SML following the instructions from https://docs.ficsit.app/satisfactory-modding/latest/ManualInstallDirections.html

Extracted SML to <game root>/FactoryGame/Mods now has ‘/FactoryGame/Mods/SML’
Placed my mod to /FactoryGame/Mods/.smod

After that I’m gettin’ an error that says:
Plugin ‘SML’ failed to load because module ‘SML’ could not be found.
Please ensure the plugin is properly installed, otherwise consider disabling the plugin for this project.

Still with the same message without my mod. Am I missing something here?

Posts: 31

Participants: 23

Read full topic
item.source: Plugin 'SML' failed to load because module 'SML' could not be found

item.title: Mods are not loading into Satisfactory
item.dc:creator: @Henry_Tilton Henry Tilton
item.description:
@Henry_Tilton wrote:

This was all working… Then I went to play again and I launch SMM and click launch. It launches the game but no mods…

The game launches via SMM as well as via the normal icon…
The game goes in with no mods… Almost like the loader isnt loading
In my Satisfactory Experimental directory there is a mods and loader directory with the files expected in there.

I have tried uninstalling SMM and reinstalling… Doesnt fix it… Same issue
I have uninstalled Satisfactory, fresh installed it… Doesnt fix it
Uninstalled Satisfactory, uninstalled SMM and reinstalled… Doesnt fix it

Posts: 12

Participants: 8

Read full topic
item.source: Mods are not loading into Satisfactory

item.title: Experimental missing
item.dc:creator: @burninghey Burninghey
item.description:
@burninghey wrote:

Well … extremely missleading here. I’m running Satisfactory experimental for some time now.
Yesterday recognized mods for the first time.

  1. downloaded the mod manager
  2. in mod manager, no warning here that experimental might not work. Instead I got 3 profiles:
  • development: cannot start the game, not in SMM, not in Steam, not from exe, nothing works
  • modded: does nothing again, tries to start, nope
  • vanilla: why would i try that, I’m running experimental. Okay, let’s try - wtf, it does start the experimental. but no mods.

PLEAASE please add a hint or warning sign, whatever, somewhere, that it does NOT support experimental

Posts: 2

Participants: 2

Read full topic
item.source: Experimental missing

item.title: Mod Manager No longer launches Game
item.dc:creator: @JamieRCHI Jamie
item.description:
@JamieRCHI wrote:

Mod Manager sets up the mods correctly, but the Launch button does not work. It appears to work for a few seconds, saying the game is running, and then the button changes back to Launch. After setting up my mods and updating everything, I can run the game with mods if I start with the Epic launcher. I see no errors from the Epic launcher. I am running experimental only. Have not tried it with Early Access enabled. It shouldn’t matter since both Early Access and Experimental are at the same build number currently.

Participants: 9

item.title: Confusing instructions for upgrade to SML
item.dc:creator: @Clive_Flint Clive Flint
item.description:
@Clive_Flint wrote:

Hi,

When a new version of SML is available the instructions say we can get in from it’s url but also says we don’t have to. This can cause confusion.

Can it be clear as to whether we have to download the install or if it’ll auto update itself when closed.

Cheers

I have to close SML to get my mouse cursor to stop strobing like a disco light between pointer and spinner modes, and once I reopen it the Permaday mod still shows as not being installed.

item.title: SML preventing me from starting Satisfactory Early Access version
item.dc:creator: @Jonathan_Dupuis Jonathan Dupuis
item.description:
@Jonathan_Dupuis wrote:

I haven’t played Satisfactory in a few weeks and when I tried to play recently, the SML UI suddenly popped up this error:

image1004×753 59.9 KB

I checked the version and 118201 is apparently the latest EA version available, so why would it be “outdated”?

If I try to load the Experimental version, everything works fine. Only the Early Access version seems bugged.

Posts: 6

Participants: 2

Read full topic
item.source: SML preventing me from starting Satisfactory Early Access version

item.title: Mod loader and Game version?
item.dc:creator: @Robert_Walters Robert Walters
item.description:
@Robert_Walters wrote:

I gt an error below, i thought it was a mod at first, but after studying the message, i am thinking the error is from the mod loader expecting a different version of the game. Suggestions?

Error: Game version incompatible. Installed: 118201. bootstrapper requires >=117050, SML requires >=119805 All changes were discarded.

Posts: 6

Participants: 4

Read full topic
item.source: Mod loader and Game version?
